VISIT US AT IBC!

Grass Valley provides end-to-end solutions for the live media and entertainment industry. We work with the world's most influential media brands, powering their media centres, mobile production units, 24-hour newsrooms, and sports streaming platforms.

See how Grass Valley can support your transformation.

Our Solutions

INFRASTRUCTURE

Multiviewing, conversion, switching and control, with hardware or as SaaS on prem or in the cloud. Choose the solution that best meets your requirements:

Kaleido IP and the MV1200

Kudos Pro, Densité XIP, Alchemist X

Sirius

GV Orbit

CAMERA

Our LDX Series cameras deliver outstanding image quality in even the most demanding live applications and production environments.

The LDX series cameras with their in-house developed CMOS image sensors deliver highest light sensitivity and low image noise in combination with an outstanding high dynamic range. Native support for a wide range of HDR formats and color spaces with support for various simultaneous HDR/SDR workflows means that the cameras can be used for all conceivable requirements in HD and UHD applications

Learn more about our product range and how our cameras are being used in the industry

LIVE PRODUCTION

From the most powerful native 12G K-Frame processor with a wide range of different control surfaces, to various SaaS based solutions, Grass Valley production switchers and replay systems offer an optimal solution for a wide range of applications.

CONTENT PRODUCTION

From automated production control, to next-generation asset management, to solutions for a new era of non-linear editing, Grass Valley offers a variety of solutions for more efficient production workflows.

Ignite

PLAYOUT

Playout X

The flexible, scalable, cloud-first playout solution, it is a broadcast-ready solution for schedule-driven playout built on the GV AMPP platform, enabling flexible playout channel delivery to meet the modern challenges of diverse media delivery and consumption.
